category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxins, invigorates the Blood and reduces swellings

indications: Furuncles, sores and abscesses (Chuang Yung), appendicitis, pulmonary abscess

action.primary: Treats various types of cancer and hepatitis
Mildly dispels Blood Stasis and stops bleeding

indications: Bleeding from trauma, hematemesis, epistaxis, and painful bloody urinary dysfunction

contraindications: Use with caution for those with Blood Deficiency.

notes: Some sources list this herb in the Anti-Cancer category.
It is mostly used for toxic sore throat and cancers.

This herb cools Heat, resolves toxicity, expels Wind, disperses Blood, promotes movement of Qi, facilitates water, unblocks the collaterals, breaks up Stasis, and alleviates pain. It treats Blood Lin syndrome, hematemesis, and epistaxis internally and poisonous snakebite, boils, abscesses, deep-set noxious sores and toxic swellings topically.

Both Ban Zhi Lian and Hb. Andrographitis #{ChuanXinLian} Chuan Xin Lian clear Heat, resolve toxicity, reduce swelling and alleviate pain. Ban Zhi Lian is acrid, bitter and cold and is better at eliminating Stagnation, reducing swelling and alleviating pain. It is used for Lung, Stomach and Intestinal abscesses (including cancers) and Blood Stasis due to trauma. Chuan Xin Lian is bitter, cold and better at clearing Heat and resolving toxicity. It also cools Blood Heat, and reduces swelling and is much more bitter than Ban Zhi Lian.
This is one of the most frequently used anti-cancer herbs.
It is used to treat esophageal, Stomach and uterine cancer.
